alert.note: Alert for Lonoke (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 2:59PM CDT until March 31 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN PRAIRIE...NORTH CENTRAL LONOKE AND SOUTH CENTRAL WHITE COUNTIES... At 259 PM CDT, a confirmed large and dangerous tornado was located over Sylvania, or near Cabot, moving northeast at 55 mph. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. TAKE COVER NOW! HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Confirmed tornado. IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be destroyed. Considerable damage to homes, businesses, and vehicles is likely and complete destruction is possible. Locations impacted include... Cabot... Beebe... Ward... Austin in Lonoke County... Thurman... Old Austin... McRae... Sylvania... Garner... Vinity Corner... Butlerville... Hickory Plains... Woodlawn... TORNADO...OBSERVED TORNADO DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall may hide this tornado. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
